Situated in 🇺🇦Dnipro, it is one of the world’s most well-known designers of space technology, satellites & rockets. The company honorably bears Yangel’s name. https://t.co/q676aYmNPb

Great political leader of the Cossack state, hetman Pylyp Orlyk was born #OTD in 1672.

In 1710 he created Ukraine's first Constitution. One of the world’s earliest constitutions. The document is on display till mid-November in Kyiv’s St.Sophia.
Thanx @swedense for providing it☺️ https://t.co/CJfvod4i5V

Remarkable composer, pedagogue & music critic Yakiv Stepovy was born #OTD in 1883 in Kharkiv.

Stepovy is one of the founders of the national school of composition.

He created songs and romances to the verses of our poets Taras Shevchenko, Lesia Ukrainka, Maksym Rylsky & others. https://t.co/LMkrtc0SIo

One of our most popular artists of the late 19th - early 20th century Serhii Vasylkivskyi was born #OTD in 1854 in Izum, Kharkiv region.

The artist left behind about 3500 works, mostly landscapes.

Fully destroyed by bolsheviks in 1934-36.

Rebuilt in 1990s after Ukraine restored independence.

Our great human rights champion Petro Hryhorenko was born OTD in 1907.

Red Army general & WWII hero, after the war he openly opposed Soviet totalitarianism. Stripped of his general stars, imprisoned, tortured by punitive psychiatry. Yet never stopped fighting for human rights. https://t.co/O9PW4Me4O5
